🇪🇺🇺🇸 EUROPE RAMPS UP DEFENSE SPENDING AS U.S. PULLS BACK

With Trump scaling down U.S. support, European leaders just approved billions to strengthen their own defenses.

At a high-stakes summit, 26 out of 27 EU nations backed a plan to boost military funding and reaffirmed support for Ukraine. Hungary refused to sign.

Macron says Europe is in a “new era” and must prepare to stand on its own—whether the U.S. is on board or not.

Source: CNN

Whether you agree that the executive order is aggressive enough in buying Bitcoin, just pause for a moment to reflect on the fact Bitcoin has achieved full and complete political capture.

🚨🇺🇸 ACTIVIST BEHIND ‘TESLA TAKEDOWN’ CALLS ELON A CRIMINAL—WHILE CHEERING ON VANDALISM

Valerie Costa isn’t just protesting—she’s running a website that helps activists attack Tesla, proudly encouraging vandalism in the name of her crusade.

She openly admits her movement is inspired by Luigi Mangione and calls Elon’s DOGE initiative “criminal,” even though Trump won on a platform that backed it to fix the budget.

Valerie:

"We don't want to just waste our energy protesting for the sake of protesting.

Whether it was troublemakers or partners that we've been working with over the last few weeks, we've planned multiple actions at Tesla."

Source: @KanekoaTheGreat

🇶🇦 QATAR PM: WE ARE AGAINST IRAN HAVING NUCLEAR WEAPONS

Prime Minister of Qatar, Mohammed bin Abdulrahman Al Thani:

"A nuclear weapon is bad for the region, for any country, whether it's Iran or any other country.

There are concerns, of course, whenever any nuclear program is developed around your region.

"Those concerns are not only military, but also security and safety concerns. As I mentioned, if the water is contaminated..."

Source: @TCNetwork

Ethrex by @class_lambda and reth by @paradigm proven with RISC-V zkVMs commoditized the stack of many teams. I still remember the debates from two years ago about what would be best. They are irrelevant now. The technical motto for the EVM chains wil disappear. Alt VMs actually can have an advantage if they can do things EVM ones can’t.

With one click you will be able to launch zk rollups with transactions costing a penny. 

In a few months to a year with based sequencing you will have composability between different clusters. With @gattacahq and @class_lambda we built a first working version. @Spire_Labs has a different flavor with some advantages and other disadvantages. @taikoxyz has been by far the one moving fastest. Many other teams are pushing for this to become a reality too. We have different visions but we’re all pushing for interoperability between the L2s.

ZK proving became a reality fast enough. Based sequencing will become a reality too and we will be pushing for it to happen.

Happy #InternationalWomensDay! 🌍🌹

When you have traders stating they don't care about the tech and instead of using their funds to support the tech and don't allow sonic whales to be so manipulative things could be better. No one cares about the price if isn't profitable.

Come you filthy traders, do something, tired of us devs needing to support you lazy lot, Buy something.

Meme aside, I get it, prices down, you are frustrated. Use my replies to shout whatever vile profanities you want at me, tell me how our tech is bad or we should do more market manipulation, or hell that we are scammers, go for it, get it out, shout at the top of your lungs, type all caps, embrace it.

Make it cathartic

Why is the timeline so heated and none of you is talking about $BOI ? @Boithebear 

I also saw the CEO @hakikiceo on the leaderboard grinding together with the community!

Just engage, don’t put so much expectations, if it cooks fine , if it doesn’t still fine, value your mental health!

Grok mistake:

It got something very basic wrong about me. I asked it where I live.

Funny that Grok doesn't know where I live, even though I  list where I do on my X Profile and have talked about this many times here on X.

It was just one example that came up in an interesting conversation with @JoshuaJBouw and @bendiken about trustworthiness in AI and crypto (Joshua created the first proof of stake system). They visited my home, are visiting from Dubai.

Arto sees the world of AI needing to move to a new kind of AI that validates data and understands how it changes over time (and he's building such a system). Like my address. Most websites say I live in Half Moon Bay, because I did for 12 years, but Grok isn't smart enough to put together that my profile is more relevant for that than all the other data that built its LLM. 

Shows that Grok isn't strongly integrated here on X yet, too. I can't wait until it is, would love to have it watch my lists. 

Yet another reminder that we don't yet have AGI. 

AGI would get this right, wouldn't it?
It’s wholesome to believe in something.
$MOVE shaping up nicely and morphing into something that looks like a bullish structure again https://t.co/25ohWpruDm
…and if something fails to rent?
